name: THE ARMOUR OF ECHO (THE BLACK)
description:
Lord Echo is the God of Leading Astray (also known as; The Magic Rabbit, Du Hexen Hase, The White Rabbit, etc). He is a powerful, ancient often malevolent Fae outcast and anarchist who has found a place as leader of one of the Four Houses of The Endless City known as "The Order of Echo".

Echo like most powerful Fae takes many forms although they are always in some way related to the symbology of "the rabbit". He can appear as benign or downright frightening depending on his motivations and intent. On the battlefield, during the War of The Dreaming he took the form of a huge (10 feet tall) rabbit-headed human-shaped warrior - in this form, this was his armour.
